channel.title: Homes on Nathan Broadbent
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Nathan Broadbent

item.title: about
item.description: Hi, my name is Nathan Broadbent and I'm a software developer from Auckland, New Zealand. I've been writing web, mobile, and desktop applications professionally since 2009. document.write("for " + (new Date().getFullYear() - 2009) + " years."); I especially enjoy working with startups and building my own products. I've worked with many different tools and technologies, including Ruby on Rails, Go, Java, Python, React, Ember.js, TypeScript, Node.js, Next.js, C, C++, Objective-C, Swift, React Native, and many others.
